setNome(e.nome)} className="border border-gray-300 rounded-md py-2 px-4 w-full focus:outline-none focus:ring focus:border-blue-300" />

setData(e.Data)} className="border border-gray-300 rounded-md py-2 px-4 w-full focus:outline-none focus:ring focus:border-blue-300" />
); }; export default Form;
